title: 03/30/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/30/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NBC's Peter King about the new OT rule in the NFL. Does he agree with what they changed it to? Chargers Head Coach Brandon Staley also shares his thoughts on the rule. Was he on board with it? And Brian Windhorst calls in to discuss the future for LeBron and the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
